selected_quotes: Another paper on missing trials. Once again, half unpreported. #alltrials The ABPI says
Results for nearly half of US cancer clinical trials remain unpublished 3 years after completion. cc
Show us the data! Only half of #cancer trial results disseminated 3 yrs after study completion.
If not publishing cancer trials doesnt get you mad. it should. read this in JCO. h/t @bengoldacre

citation.abstract: To evaluate to what extent results of completed trials of cancer drugs conducted in the United States are publicly available at ClinicalTrials.gov, as required by the Food and Drug Administration Amendments Act (FDAAA), or are published in journals.
citation.title: Public Availability of Results of Trials Assessing Cancer Drugs in the United States
